com.sap.spe.conversion

Interface IExchangeRate

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public interface IExchangeRate
extends java.io.Serializable
    The interface of an exchange rate object which is used to define how a currency conversion is performed.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getFromCurrency

        java.lang.String getFromCurrency()
        Returns:
        my source currency name. (R/3-field: TCURR-FCURR)

      • getToCurrency

        java.lang.String getToCurrency()
        Returns:
        my target currency name. (R/3-field: TCURR-TCURR)

      • getDate

        SAPDate getDate()
        Returns:
        the start date from which the exchange rate is valid. (R/3-field: TCURR-GDATU)

      • getRate

        java.math.BigDecimal getRate()
        Returns:
        my exchange rate read from DB

      • getFromFactor

        int getFromFactor()
        Returns:
        the 'from factor' used for currency conversion between source and target currency. (R/3-field: TCURF-FFACT)

      • getToFactor

        int getToFactor()
        Returns:
        the 'to factor' used for currency conversion between source and target currency. (R/3-field: TCURF-TFACT)

      • getExternalRepresentation

        java.lang.String getExternalRepresentation()
        Returns:
        my external respresentation for displaying it

      • getExchangeRateTypeName

        java.lang.String getExchangeRateTypeName()
        Returns:
        the name of the exchange rate type. (R/3-field: TCURR-KURST)

      • getExchangeRateType

        IExchangeRateType getExchangeRateType()
        Returns:
        the exchange rate type. (R/3-table: TCURT)

      • getResultingRate5Decimals

        java.math.BigDecimal getResultingRate5Decimals()
        Returns:
        my resulting rate as a BigDecimal that is rounded to 5 decimals. (R/3-field: TCURR-UKURS)

      • getResultingRate5DecimalsAsString

        java.lang.String getResultingRate5DecimalsAsString()
        Returns:
        my resulting rate as a String (R/3-field: TCURR-UKURS)

      • getResultingRate5DecimalsAsString

        java.lang.String getResultingRate5DecimalsAsString(SAPLocale locale)
        Parameters:
        locale - locale of user for locale-dependent representation and also as language of error messages which might occur
        Returns:
        my resulting rate in a locale-dependent representation (e.g. number of decimals, separator).

      • getResultingRate11Decimals

        java.math.BigDecimal getResultingRate11Decimals()
        Returns:
        my resulting rate as a BigDecimal that is rounded to 11 decimals. (R/3-field: TCURR-UKURS)
